page.title: 20ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
page.content: We would like to thank the following people for their help: The Burnett family for letting us use their computer. The late Mr.Andrew Rennie for his int- eresting visit. Mr.and Mrs.J. More of Shirgarton and Mr. and Miss More of the Mains of Boquhan and Mr.A.Neill of the Mink Farm for letting us visit their farms and for answering our many questions. Parents of Pr.4&5 for providing tran- sport for farm visits and information. Miss Page,Countryside Ranger for her help with land-cover. Mrs.F.Clark for her invaluable help and knowledge of Kippen. Mr.G.Pritchard,Mr.I.Leith and Mrs.A. Wright for their time and information R.W.A.Begg for his book about the church.
